heroSection.title: Specs Driving Intelligence, Redefining Industry Rules
heroSection.subTitle: From vague instructions to precise execution. Specient combines strict specifications (Specs) with the flexibility of Generative AI to provide zero-error intelligent agent services for government, aviation, research, and other sectors.

valueProposition.title: Why Choose Spec-Driven?
valueProposition.description: Traditional LLMs are prone to hallucinations. We transform industry standards and operational specifications (Specs) into code constraints that Agents not only understand but strictly adhere to.
